attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2022-0480

Date: 2022-05-16

Whereas the Longlac Chamber of Commerce, in Ontario, the certificate of formation of which was recorded under the Boards of Trade Act on January 25, 2018, has ceased to exercise its franchises;

 

Therefore, Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Industry, dissolves the Longlac Chamber of Commerce under section 43 of the Boards of Trade Act.


 

Attendu que la Longlac Chamber of Commerce (Ontario), dont le certificat de formation a été enregistré en vertu de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce le 25 janvier 2018, a cessé d’exercer ses pouvoirs,

 

À ces causes, sur recommandation du ministre de l’Industrie et en vertu de l’article 43 de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil dissout la Longlac Chamber of Commerce.
